recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 3/4 cup freshly grated Pecorino Romano cheese
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the spaghetti and cook until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of the pasta cooking water, then drain the spaghetti.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C). 2. Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a baking sheet. 3. Spread tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edge. 4. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese over the sauce. 5. Drizzle olive oil over the cheese. 6. Sprinkle salt to taste. 7. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden brown. 8. Top with fresh basil leaves.
